name: angel.project
description:
Proof-of-concept stages still. A small group of androids are in an endless war with some other mechanical hive mind.

Fly around, use your shield to reflect projectiles, overload your systems and enter into overclock mode (essentially bullet time) to wreak havoc. Be wary though, you'll take double damage in the process!

For now there's a couple of weapons you can switch through, a couple of basic enemy types and three characters to choose from, each with their creepy synthesized voice lines and appearance.

Enjoy, and let me know what you think!
